Articles.Content: I made the receiver using a fuel tank on the short truss which come with probodobydyne pack. the claw is made by attaching lander legs on the core. It takes time and patience to line up during the docking procedure, but once you get it the connection made is somewhat loose, but strong.
That's cool. It's really loose, though. It's not the best docking for EVA since everything just goes spinning.

That's cool. It's really loose, though. It's not the best docking for EVA since everything just goes spinning.

Well yes, but the spinning is manageable and I didnt get rid of the spin before EVA-ing the second kerbal so thats why it was spinning all the way through.Yes, the design does need some improvements to make it not so loose. Ill try adding a second tank for the reciever to make it longer and not so wobbly.

Edited August 24, 2012 by Bhopz
